content.detailedDescription:
Austin tx. oct. 30 2010 4:45 pm. very clear sky a few high cirrus clouds.Location: larmar st./airport blvd. notice a very bright dot in the sky 80 degree off of horizon toward the east. altitude very high in the sky( above airline traffic) object was blinking or tumbling moving toward the nne slowly very slowly. went out of sight. thirty min later at 5:20 pm in same general area of sky notice a nother object very bright in the sky moving alittle faster but still slow like drifting toward the nne. these were not planes or helicopter. i know what a plane looks like even at 30,000 feet.These were round dots in the sky like orbs 
  i recorded the inguration and when they show bushes helicopter leaving you can see a black stealth(something)plane come in and out of the clouds but there is no noise of a plane also when they show a recording of when reagan in his helicopter you can see disk shap objects in the back ground following him, i recorded the cbs station so i don't have the cnn portion. but it is very interesting. i just wonder what they know that they won't tell us. maybe we don't need to know ( my opinion )
content.summary: Blinking dot in sky daylight sighting

content.detailedDescription: Around 4pm on sunday october 24, 2010 i was at a friends house on the northwest side of chicago near ohare airport we were watching nfl games. i went on the back deck to enjoy the day when i looked up and directly south and saw a dark silver sphere ufo pass from west to east at fast pace. it had no wings and made no noise but darted across the sky. i have been seeing this phenomenon a lot for over a year now and i knew that once i saw one there should be another ufo shortly after. i went inside and grabbed my friends wife's sony hdr-sr12 handy cam and waited. a few minutes later a black triangle appeared in the sky. it was floating west to east toward lake michigan. i turned on the handy cam and recorded about a minute and forty five seconds worth of this object. the triangle ufo appeared to be moving in place with the nose of the triangle pointing in various directions. the ufo also looked at one point to transform from a solid black triangle to a chevron shape. still while floating it appeared to produce a small straight "banner" looking appendage or something that came out of the bottom of the craft. the objected continued to float east until it vanished from sight. i tried to run out to the front of the house to try and keep recording but it disappeared. i will try and upload the video to mufon but when i try and watch other video reports on mufon the video does not play. if you search chicago november 2010 ufo on you tube you should be able to see what i captured. it has been over a year now that i have been seeing and recording anomalous objects in the chicago sky but this is the first time i was able to record a daytime solid black triangle ufo. not a balloon not a kite a lot smaller than a regional jet that i also recorded in my video to give comparison to the ufo triangle. here is the link to the video. thanks for reading. *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Daytime black triangle ufo hovers over chicago - hd video

content.detailedDescription: Sunday evening 11/7/10 at 7:30 i was in my driveway loading trash in my truck.It was a nice clear night for stargazing,so i stopped what i was doing to look at the stars. as i stood there looking up i noticed an airplane moving directly over my house. there was nothing unusual about the airplane it looked like any other plane flying at night, cruising at normal speed and altitude with blue and red strobe lights. as i continued to watch the plane i noticed movement out of the corner of my eye.I looked to my right and saw what was the brightest object in the sky, and it was moving. the fantastic part was i was able to look back at the airplane then back to the object and compare the two and after doing this several times it was easy to rule out just another airplane. they were not alike. there were no flashing lights, no sound, it was just very bright. the object then changed direction too quickly to be a plane.As soon as it changed direction, my heart started pounding in my chest and i felt very anxious.  after watching this for about 20 seconds it suddenly got half as bright then turned into a pinprick of light and was gone. going from the brightest thing in the sky to disappering took about 2-3 seconds. my heart was racing and i started to sweat even though it was a cold night, because i know i saw something unusual.I dont know what i saw but i do know that it wasn't an airplane, helicopter, sattelite, meteor, reflections, swamp gas, space station,or hallucination.It was going north towards murphy, north carolina when it finally vanished.I am not ashamed or embarressed to report what i saw. please let me know if anyone else saw what i saw, it would be nice to hear about other witnesses.
content.summary: A bright starlike object moved across the night sky, changed direction suddenly then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I am a retired corrections officer. i was sitting in my kitchen in the early afternoon looking out the door when i saw a whiteish colored object rise up from the tree line at a forty-five degree angle, it was moving from my right to left. i first thought it was a large balloon until it stopped and changed directions. as it moved from my left to right, i thopught maybe a plane, since i live near moody air force base and a municipal air port. however, when it stopped and remained motionless for about a half a minute, i decided that i didn't know what it was. i called my wife from the house and she and i watched the object moving around the sky for nearly fifteen minutes. first it would go up, then down, then side to side. all the while it appeared to be pulsing from white to silver. in the silver phase it almost appeared to vanish. i went in to get a camera and when i returned i took three photos and several seconds of video. later when i looked at the pictures i was surprised to see that i had actually caught the object in one photo and the video, surprised because i could not see the object in the veiw screen when i took them.When i looked back up from the camera the object was gone. i don't know if it simply moved from my field of veiw or if it streaked away. this is not the first time i have seen an unusual sight in the sky.
photo 091 shows the object in the upper left corner of the cloud. photo 093 was taken within seconds of the first one... no object. the vide shows a bird flying from right to left and the object from left to right in the right hand corner of the frame.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looking out the door, i saw an object in the distance. my wife and i watched for several minutes as it pulsed from white to silver

content.detailedDescription:
So i had reported a ufo sighting for my sister about 3 weeks ago. i hadn't seen it myself. it was a day-time ufo & she was very convinced in what she saw. so, naturally this piqued my interest, and decided to take it upon myself to do a little ufo hunting of my own.

almost every night since then (and even during the day) i would check the skies. standing out there from anywhere between an hour or two hours. i saw a few things that i thought were 'strange' but was still on the fence about it.

until last night.

i was at my sisters and we decided to go outside and see if we could see anything. and almost immediately after we started looking at the skies, it began. i remember standing there and exclaimed, "omg! look over there! wait, look over there! wait! look over there! they are everywhere!" sounds comical, i know. if you were there watching us and not the sky, you'd be laughing at us. but if you were watching the sky, you'd have been freaking out too!

at first it was just the flashing lights all over. glittering the sky. very similar to planes, but these were no planes. many of them hovered in one spot. some of them moved around slowly in strange patterns. but they were popping up everywhere. they were all over the place. you'd see one and then you'd see a dozen more popping up all over the sky.

and then there were these strange twinkling stars. or at least we thought they were stars. until they, too, started moving. and around them you could see 'shooting stars'. 

if all that wasn't incredible enough, what we were about to see was mind-boggling. 

there was a glowing mist in the distance. it wasn't too far from us. if we ran for only a few minutes, we could have reached it. at first we thought maybe it was just a fog and the light was catching it in a strange way. until we started seeing huge transluscent things flying in it. several of them. 2 or 3. they were enormous. they were close to the ground. they were only partially visible. they looks like ghosts in the sky. that's really the only way to describe it. it was the freakiest thing i'd ever seen in my life. my sister and i were screaming in terror and excitement. 

they did there circling dance for about 15-20 minutes. it was almost as if they were putting on a show just for us. it certainly felt that way.

and then one of them must have shot up way high in the sky. it was no longer a shadowy/transluscent ufo. it was saucer-shaped, glowing, and very solid-looking. and it darted to the left, southward. like it was going to land! and almost before it reached the ground (which had to have been over the town park) it just vanished. so weird.

naturally, we were really freaking out and couldn't stand anymore. too excited. too overwhelmed. i mean, it was life changing. i'd never seen anything like this before. i'd always believed. and i'd watched youtube videos, but until you see something like this with your own two eyes... it's not the same. 

but things didn't end then. we were sitting down and then we saw an unblinking set of lights. light five lights. it was no plane. like i said, unblinking lights. it was like triangular/pyramid shaped. it was so hard to tell, because it almost seemed as if it were shap-shifting. and it just flew across the sky, slowly, spinning. sometimes hovering. floating. 

these sightings lasted for about 2-3 hours before they started to slow down. 

it was amazing.

if you're a skeptic, my advice is go outside. know that you're going to see something. because you will.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Hundreds of ufos in the night sky! all different types!

content.detailedDescription: Was awakened by the dog to go out.  the time was 4:52a.M. walked outside with dog in back yard and saw object. first thought it was a plane, there are a lot in the area, since we are close to an airport.  but object was hovering dead still pulsing/flashing amber, red, green, and white. it was like a cigar if it was spinning. it moved across the sky rapidly and stopped by a large crane and did not move up or down, left or right.  a plane came in from right went to left towards the airport and the object. then the object moved a small amount down almost to line up with the plane.  the plane got close to the object and the object started to dim more of an amber color.  then went inside to grab binoculars and at the same time my mother awoke to let the other dog out we looked at it trough the binoculars as it stayed in the same spot after the plane went by.  then it moved lower and started to move to the left.  just about that time another plane was heading near the object, used the camera phone but could not get a solid picture of the object.  my mother got her real camera and tried to get one as well but could not get it into focus.  this went on for about 1 hour it was almost like it was trying to observe the passing planes.  it would move in small increments to basically be on a close path with the planes.  the movement was very slow, very precise.  the object stayed in same spot, same altitude for approximately 15 min. pulsed bright green, red, amber, and white.  there were no planes during that time.  object then moved right very slowly then almost faded out and it moved behind trees.  for the next 10 minutes we stayed out side and it did not reappear.
content.summary: Taking the dog out saw the object hovering then move across sky and stopped

content.detailedDescription:
Uruapan, michoac���n, mexico
i just woke up and finished a cup of coffee. i live in a spanish style house ( all the rooms communicate to a patio in the center of the house). at 5:55am november 8, 2010 i went out side my kitchen to look at the sky and saw 7 to 9 dim white lights in a delta or boomerang formation moving slowly through the sky silently. they were a little dimmer than the surrounding stars. they came from the east/south east and turned north. the relationship of the distances between the light seemd to bend or curve as it turned north. i lost sight of the lights when they passed behind my neighbors house.  the whole event lasted maybe 15 seconds. i thought it was meterorites or space junk at first but it did not leave a trail and changed direction. i wanted to grab my cell phone and try to take a picture but i wouldn't have had time. i was amazed at what i saw because i know it wasn't a commercial jet. i am sure it wasn't the flight that arrives from tijuana because that passed at 6:21am over my house and makes a lot of noise. i didn't want to call the authorities because of the current environment here, they would just laugh.
content.summary: 9 dim lights in a delta formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work last night on security patrol for a client in detroit and was in the parking lot at the time of the incident. i was surveying all areas as it is my job to watch for any ususual activity from any direction. all of the sudden a bright, greenish/blueish light captures my eye and appears to be falling toward the earth. 

as the light is falling it goes parallel with the earth and completely disappears. it almost simulated the motion of a plane that was falling out of the sky that was no longer in control and preparing for impact. i thing the strangest part was that all i could make of it in the three seconds that i saw the object was the color and that it was nothing more than a light. 

there was no defined shape that i could see. i thought of the possiblility that it wasn't a ufo, but rather something in space that may be extremely common, but i don't believe that it is considering it came from nowhere as well as left in a matter of seconds.
content.summary: A large flash of light came from nowhere and appeared to be falling toward the earth and then disappeared again.

content.detailedDescription:
My name is *wit's name deleted--cms/sg, i live in clearwater overlooking the bayside bridge. i got your name off of one of the ufo shows on the history channel. i wanted to report a siting and see if there were any more like it around the same time.

in early september i was watching the tele at home around 9pm. i had just put my daughter to sleep and the house was pretty quiet. i heard and felt this weird rumble, it was very gentle and faint but i could just sense something. without giving it much thought i went outside and as soon as i opened my door these bright lights in the distant sky caught my attention. it was hovering over the bridge; at first i assumed it was a plane since we are close to the air port but this thing was literately hovering, it did not move at all. i stared at it for a while, trying to take in everything i was seeing, at the same time looking for any neighbors that were outside to have them verify what i was seeing. there were 3 lights all along side each other but evenly spaced out. in between them, but a little lower, were 4 red lights that were blinking at a slow rate. i watched for a bout 10 minutes before it moved, it moved quickly to the right (my right) then back to the left. at this point i went inside to get my camera but it was too dark out and the image was not clear. as i continued to watch this light, about the size of a distance star from my view, came flying up towards this ufo from the lower right (my right) corner. it flew towards the ufo and when it got really close it disappeared and within 2 mins the entire thing vanished. it didn't fly away, it vanished out of site within an instant! 

i thought i was crazy for a while, but five minutes later i hear the sound of two choppers, they weren't coast guard choppers i don't believe, i think it was unmarked and a dark color. one flew over to where i saw the ufo , over the bay, then it left and the other helicopter flew around the surrounding area 4 times before flying away. in a way i felt like that confirmed what i saw was indeed a ufo. i went inside and hopped online afterwards only to find that there were a number of ufo sitings with in the clearwater/tampa bay area this past summer. i was wondering if anyone else has contacted you with this same story
content.summary: 3 lights with 4 red lights beneath

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I am roughly 20 miles west of philadelphia, pa and on or approximately april 23rd, 2010, i took a cigarette break from playing a poker tournament online.  the tournaments have scheduled breaks, lasting 5 minutes, which occur at :55 past the hour.  i went outside at 11:55 pm and it was a cool, unusually quiet night with a clear sky.  i lit a smoke took a couple drags and was facing in the direction of northeast/east (have since used a compass) when i heard something behind me.  it wasn't like i heard an engine - i can't describe it - but i heard something moving through the air.  

i partially turned by body and looked up and i was completely frozen and in awe looking at this massive thing flying overhead of me.  it was considerably bigger than anything i've ever seen before flying in the sky.  

it was triangular in shape, black or very dark in color and enormous.  what was unusual though, beyond its vast size, was that (1) it had no wings whatsoever, (2) it wasn't moving at a high velocity and (3) it didn't seem to be attempting to hide (it was hard to miss).  another strange aspect was the low altitude.  i frequently look at planes fly overhead when i take smoke breaks (in the day and at night) and whatever i saw was flying between the altitude of where the small single engine planes fly and the commercial planes fly and was closer to the altitude of the smaller planes than the commercial planes (it was quite low).  

i watched it fly overhead until i lost sight of it beyond the tree line and it wasn't until afterwards that i realized what i had just witnessed.  when i saw it, i was literally frozen and couldn't move - the mass was breathtaking and i was in complete awe.  i had no idea what i was looking at, and have never seen anything like it up to that day or since then.   it dwarfed anything else i have ever seen in the air or even in pictures on tv or the internet.  i don't want to underestimate or embellish the size, but i would say it was at least 75-150x bigger than any other plane i've seen in the sky.  

i did not report this when it originally happened because i had no idea who or where to report it to.  it wasn't until i saw mutual ufo network mentioned on a tv program last week that i decided that i should at the very least report and describe what i saw.  

like i remarked previously, it was like nothing i had ever seen before and after much searching online, the only thing that i found that it could resemble is a black triangle as described by wikipedia.  unlike what is related by wikipedia's entry , (link moved to additional evidence section --cms/sg. i did not see any lights.   and while the shape was triangular, it wasn't equilateral and symetrical as depicted in the picture.  it was more isosceles-like.  

let me make something perfectly clear: i had never heard of a black triangle until my subsequent searches and i was completely sober nor was i taking any medications, otc or prescribed, during or previously leading up to the sighting.  i was not taken aboard and nothing bizarre happened to me during or after the sighting.  i have never been to a psychologist and never have had hallucinations.  

lastly, if i had to guess what i saw, it was some kind of transport ship because of its enormous size.
content.summary: I think i saw a black triangle

content.detailedDescription:
I work as a security officer a few miles outside of boonville, in.  while on duty tonight i looked out my passenger side window and noticed a bright light in the sky (to the west).  at first i assumed it to be a star or planet, but it was extremely bright.  i watched the light for several minutes and it appeared to be moving, but because of the distance and lack of noticable landmark's it was hard to tell.  

i took out my camcorder and tried to record the light but because of bright lights where i am i couldn't get anything to show up, as the light was very small from where i was.  i eventually moved the car closer to the road away from the lights and tried again, and was eventually able to get some video of the light but because of zoom and the time of day there are issues with focus at times and the video is pretty jerky.

after recording about 3 minutes of video the camcorder battery was low so i put it back down in the glove box and when i looked back to keep watching the object, it was gone.  it was at this point that i knew for sure it could not have been a star.  i looked away for a few more seconds and when i looked back it was again in roughly the same spot.  this occured 2 more times while i was watching.  during the several minutes i watched it it did not appear to make any major moves in position.  i'd say it was maybe 15-20 deg. off the horizon.  there is a tree line, but since it was dark i couldn't get a good idea of relative position or height.  

the light was a bright white, and looked to phase to a more reddish light later on.  after watching 10-15 minutes the light appeared to be moving lower on the horizon, and eventually it sank below the tree line.  i believe i could still see it very low through the trees for another few seconds but eventually i lost total view of it.  i continued looking for a few more minutes but never saw it reappear, so i left here to go make my rounds.
content.summary: Bright light in sky to the west

content.detailedDescription:
we were outside then we saw a weird looking thing (what we thought was a star) and upon closer inspection it was flashing reds blues greens whites oranges, then saw to the left of the ship a smaller light white in color dot straight up into the sky. then shortly after to the right of the ship we saw another same sized ship dart up. about thirty minutes later we saw another ship dart of but this one made a backwards c shape towards the ship.
me and my step brother saw it.


1. outside having a cigarette
2. the flashing colors
3.A star or airplane tower
4.The big one swerved back and forth and over time a drastic movement up and slightly down on occasions 
5. disbelieve, scared, in shock, and at times excitement
6. we didn't lose sight of the main one, we were to freaked out to see anything else move around it.
content.summary: One big flashing multi colored disc with 3 smaller ships dart through the sky

content.detailedDescription: At inlaws house around highland mall notice very bright object in sky moving nne very slowing and blinking time 4:45 oct.30. thirty min later saw object in sky again very bright dot moving very slowiny nne this time not blinking.. very high allitude was not a plane or helicopter . just a bright dot in the sky same type of object somebody else wrote about from the 16th of oct. something is up there
content.summary: Bright dot in sky moving slowly nne

content.detailedDescription:
I���m a college student in indianapolis, indiana. it was around 6:26 p.M. on 11/7/2010 when i was standing on the sidewalk of w. michigan street that lead back to campus apartment housing at iupui (my college).  we usually have a lot of airplanes and helicopters around here, and at first i thought it was an airplane until i realized that it was flying way too low, but then i realized that it must have been a helicopter. i couldn���t have been more wrong i realized, as i looked up and saw a circular object flying right up above me, moving straight in the direction i was facing. it was huge, and if a full moon were out, i would have to say that from my perspective, i would have to say that maybe 15-17 full moons would be equal to the size of it. i���d like to give a better comparison, but i was in a state of shock. i did spend what felt like a long time gazing at it, although in actuality, only about 2 minutes had passed. 
the sky was clear, but being in the city, it appears as pitch black because of the city lights. it was either flying really low, or it was extremely huge.  i feel stupid for not thinking about getting a picture, but i was in total shock, as i don���t really believe in ufos, or at least didn���t until now, and even now i���m still skeptical. i did, however, try my best to draw a picture afterwards, even though i���m not good at drawing. the ufo had red lights on it. if i remember correctly, i���d say about 3 of 4 of them, and i believe that red light was coming from the center as well. since i was looking up at it, all i could see was what it looked like directly underneath. it looked like the stereotypical ufo, or flying saucer, in most aspects. besides being a perfect circle, it looked like what a mushroom looks like from underneath, whereas you can see the edges of what might be a domed top from below, and striations leading towards the center. most of the red lights were towards the exterior, with the exception of the center (where the stem of a mushroom would be). here was where more red light emitted. 
two things struck me as odd that distinguished this when compared to the stereotypical portrayal. for one thing, the front of the ship had a silver section, which reminded me of a bird shape since the shape had three corners. secondly, i think that there may have been a protrusion at the base of it, which logically made me think that maybe somebody was playing a prank and it was actually some type of blimp because of how it glided forward, but it seemed much too big to logically call it this. there was no logical explanation for what happened. i went back to the apartment building and called my grandpa to tell him what i saw because i felt like i needed to tell someone that wouldn���t make fun of me. i made this call at 6:34p.M., and stepped through the back door of the apartment complex. i was partway into the conversation when i saw the object again flying over the apartment building, even though i thought it had already passed. 
at this point a passerby was walking down the sidewalk and saw me looking in shock up at the sky. he then saw the object too and said that it ���sure is a wide airplane���. (he didn���t see it until it was going off into the distance.) i said that ���was definitely no airplane.��� this second encounter lasted until 6:37p.M., so it was three minutes long. this second encounter took place on porto alegre street, and again the object continued moving in the same direction until it got past the river, where it ascended up and disappeared into the sky. a girl walking a ways behind me during the first incident didn���t bother looking up because she thought it was a helicopter and was busy texting, and was shocked when i told her what i saw. i was kind of angry that she hadn���t looked up and i was the only one that saw this the first time, but i extremely glad that someone else saw it the second time to prove that i wasn���t the only person that saw it.
by the way, the iupui campus apartments are near the ronald mcdonald house, which is not far from the hospital. this area is extremely easy to find on google maps, however, for some reason it doesn���t show porto alegre, but the street that the ufo went across to get to the river is white river pkwy e. dr.
content.summary: It was flying really low over w. michigan street

content.detailedDescription: Carve pro skate shop was having a grand opening event.  i was taking photos and looked up at a beautiful blue sky with zero clouds.  to the southwest a bright white object was visible at extreme altitude. the object had no winds or marks that could be identified as any conventional craft.  i snapped two photos a couple of minutes apart.  the object was very high and appeared to be moving faster than an airliner that usually has visible wings, windows, and markings.  this had none.  once it was out of sight about two minutes after the second photograph, two armed blue f18s flew right over our heads, low, less than 1000 feet above the ground in the general direction the object was last seen.
content.summary: Comet like bright white light

content.detailedDescription: I was enjoying a beautiful night under the stars. noticed two weird streaks of light within a 20 minute period approx 8pm saturday night. very fast moving. first in the west sky and one in the east. the first one i thought must have been a shooting star. appeared to me for approx 10 seconds, shot across the sky with a white light and white  trail and then vanished. when i noticed it again later in a different spot i thought that was quite a coincidence.
content.summary: Star like streaks of light

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were getting in the car and i looked up and saw five small lights blinking in and out. my attention was drawn right away because i love to look at the stars and this was strange. they were very far away, it was a strain to watch them but it was neat in a scary sort of way. they would make circles, zig zag, blink out, and then blink back on. at one point it appeared other lights came, but they then disappeared. five lights throughout and three seemed to join in and then disappear. we watched them for some time and then checked and found them again when we reached our destination. they were very coordinated in their actions.
content.summary: Several very distant lights interacting with one another forming differnt shapes

content.detailedDescription:
Was headed out with my wife to watch a movie in glendora and i spotted what i first thought was a shooting star because of what appeared to have a tail and was red/orange but as we drove closer we noticed that it was not moving that fast. it was a pretty clear night with hardly any clouds. there were other lights in the sky that were obviously planes and helicopters but this light was moving slowly. 

both my wife and i were a bit weirded out, the object then changed colors got really bright and then it kinda imploded onto itself, dont know how else explain it. 

it wasn't a plane or a helicopter nor was it a blimp. to large to be a flare of some sort. well hope this helps, did anyone else report on this?
content.summary: Ufo off the 210 and the 405

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
  i live in midtown atlanta, ga (area code 30308), and i have had a bit of an odd day. i was looking through the videos on realufos.Com earlier today for about 2 hours. around 2:15 pm i decided i needed to stop due to hunger. i got up from the couch where my laptop was, and walked towards the kitchen. i looked out of a window that has a fairly large view of the sky through an opening in the trees and i have no explanation for what i saw. three tiny white lights, very high in the sky, moving from north to south in a slow, horizontal path. the two in front were closer together and a bit higher than the 3rd. i ran for my camera, came back and did my best to zoom in and film them but i couldn't get them. they were just too tiny and far off to capture. i then called a friend who is a ufo buff and excitedly described the whole thing to him as i watched the 3rd object move in that same direction for at least another minute and a half before it too was finally blocked by trees.

  now, i am fully aware of the fact that the odds of ever seeing anything in the first place are quite slim, and then add on the odds of seeing something immediately after watching a few hours of videos on what appear to be the exact same orblike things, well it's pretty close to ridiculous. and yet, there they were. a few weeks ago i was standing in the same window talking photos of a very dramatic storm rolling in and noticed, amongst the birds flying in the high winds and leaves blowing around, that there was something else, very high up in the sky, which was not moving like either one of those things at all. this, however, was black. i watched it for about 5 minutes as it slowly drifted up and to the left, finally going into a huge storm cloud. i could not lock my camera on that either. that one i was willing to chalk up to the possibility of a balloon, even though it didn't move like ones i've ever seen in the sky before. i also saw a very similar black object in a very windy, cloudy sky over marietta, ga about 3 weeks ago while sky watching during the blue angels' practicing. that also went up high and into clouds and also, although it seems quite strange that hoaxers are letting a single black balloon go just when i happen to be looking, i chalked it up to possible balloon. but today, i can't explain away. i've never seen anything like it...Other than on these videos, that is.

  while i believe that there is no possible way that earth is the only inhabited planet, i do try to be as skeptical as possible and look hard for any other reasonable explanation before admitting that i am stumped. but, i am stumped. about 10 years ago on a very dark, heavily clouded day i saw something else in buckhead that was similar that i tried reporting online to someone but they could not figure out what i meant or saw, as i had no camera with me, so there were no images or video. that one was also black, but much lower than the other things i've seen, moving at a slow, steady pace towards the east, horizontally across the sky. but that one changed shapes. it never stopped morphing as it moved. i was watching as i drove, and looking at other people in cars to see if anyone else was seeing it, but no one else seemed to. i watched it for about 2 minutes until trees got in the way for 10 or 15 seconds and when i cleared them, it was gone. i wish i had some sort of photo or video image to back up what i am saying today, but alas, i have only my report so what i have done is photoshop a shot of the same area i saw them cross, as an example of what i saw today. this looks pretty spot on, except what i saw appeared to be actual lights. i repeat, this is not an actual photo, just one doctored in photoshop as an example. i'd definitely be interested to know if anyone else in the atlanta area reported anything strange today.

thank you for your time,
*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg
content.summary: Viewed 3 tiny white lights move across sky this afternoon

content.detailedDescription: I was infront of my house downtoun salida co. it was a clear sunny day and i was talking with my neighbor out on the sidewalk. thats when i looked up and saw what i thought was a milar high alt. wether ballon witch i have never seen before. so i grabed my camera a sony cyber-shot 7.62mega pixels with 3x optical zoom. zoomed in all the way and took four shots of the object. on that day the wind was at an averge 20-30mph from west to east. so i thought it strange the object went from directley overhead to due north out of sight in under 120 seconds.The forth shot shows my roof for contrast and depth.In the first three shots the top of photo is east in the forth shot east is to the right side of photo. later upon review i found other u.F.O.S not visibul to the naked eye during the sighting.
content.summary: I thought i was looking at a high alt. wether ballon till i viewed photos, and found it was the shape of a piramid with a light on bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
Hovering out by the beach with blinking light! dark
also checked out local airport did not see any flights
content.summary: Hovering out by the beach with blinking light! dark

content.detailedDescription:
My husband was driving north on the road from sedona into flagstaff on wed, nov. 3rd.  at about 5:10 pm he saw a very large very bright silver object on the top of mt. humphries.  he called and reported it to the local authorities.  at the time we were not thinking that it was anything that couldn't be explained logically. we thought it might have been a plane crash or something of that nature.  the police had no other reports that day of such an object, and the object is no longer there.

however, today i came across a craigslist add in the "rants and raves" section.  this post was from a 63 year old man who was hiking mt humphries the same night that my husband saw the object.  he said that he saw some 8 ft tall alien looking people walking on the mountian.  

i do not know what the credibility of the craislist post is, but i thought that it was weird that the two supposedly happened on the same day and in the same place.
content.summary: Very bright circular silver

content.detailedDescription: I am a stargazer and sit at window at night looking at the stars with my 70 mm zoom  stargazer binoculars. i do this as a hobby and relaxation. there is no homes in front of my house across the street, only a field with some trees and tall grass and uneven terrain. it was a half moon this night. it was fairly bright . i sat down around 11pm after putting my daughter to bed to do my nightly routine of star watching etc., i noticed some lights in the middle of the field....And knew there was not a home there and the lights were steady small burning and white to led in color. no blinking and so i looked through the binoculars to see it closer because i have never seen that before....What i saw next gave me intense fear and my blood pressure dropped because in disbelief i saw a whitish disk shaped object partially hidden by a tree and brush on the left side where the lights were and sticking out to the side about 20 feet or so was a craft....I was just in awe and looking at it when a four-legged dark looking animal of some sort (later found out it was a dog because in a few minutes it came up my driveway and was just sniffing around)jumped up on the craft and started walking around....It was at that time that 4 to 5 creatures, beings or human upright type beings appeared and chased the animal off of the craft....It went to the edge and jumped off and one of the creatures, light in color but i could not see details....Only that it was fairly short about three or four feet high ran and did an unbelievable leap from the edge of the ship....Looked like a flea jumping..All of the creatures movements were weird like out of a different time....Like they would move in fast forward and then stop and slow and then fast forward again. i was very scared at what i was seeing but i was determined to watch and decided to vent my blinds so they may not see me. i did not want to make contact for fear of abduction or something and i have a small daughter. so i just observed all night long. i thought for a moment that they were stranded. they had gotten so close to us, all the houses but nobody had on porch lights etc and were already in bed, i guess. i wondered that they were so bold as to be so close but thought they might have had craft problems. the lights were fading slowly over time like the craft was losing power....Then it looked like a signal light in the shape of three pinpoints of light forming a triangle only was left appearing....Kind of like some distress signal.  the beings were down off of the craft milling around the base and then disappeared into the woods behind the craft.  i saw some flashes of elongated laser type lights here and there like they were throwing something or striking something. i kept thinking that they may be waiting for another ship to come and get them....But what about their ship? was it going to be hauled off by some ufo tow ship? i was going to watch to find out.  i watched until around 3:45am when i noticed some more activity around the craft. no lights still except for an occasional small faint light in the upper corner of the part of the craft behind the tree side....Then it would go off, then ten or fifteen minutes later it would come on again...Then go off.  it was around four am that i started thinking they had better get their craft out or people will be seeing this in daylight. i saw that the craft looked like it was covered by some kind of tarp or something because it looked like wrinkles were in it...Very strange. several creatures were jumping around and on top of the craft and then going back in woods....And at one time sneaked or moved over to the corner of one of the houses close to me and i did not want to see it coming any closer so i put my binoculars down and closed my blinds....Really it just scared me too much.....I decided to turn on my carport light ....Maybe it would scare them off or something and they would know people were waking up etc....I did that.....And left it on for five minutes. then turned it back off and went back to observe...I fully expected the whole thing to be gone....But no it was not....Craft still there...I wanted to see it take off or get beamed up or whatever so i was still waiting.....Then about 5:30 am still no sun....It was to rise at 7:19 am., i noticed that the craft looked slightly different again....This time it had a black opening on the side like part of it opened up....Maybe they all evacuated. this is what i was thinking...It was then i looked up to the far left of the sky and saw what looked like a bright steady star....But it was moving...In a shaking hovering type pattern moving right then down some then right then down then stationary then right .....Like it was coming my way and to the forest there....I thought this might be the ship to either get them or the mother ship or something.....When it got close to the tree line i did not see it anymore. it was then that a weird shift took place with the ship....It moved or vibrated right to left but did not disappear...I kept watching until the sun was coming up just enought for me to make out that now what i was looking at was a red mitzubishi car!!! did the ship morph itself into a car? i know that i know i was not looking at a car all night....What about the lights? the creatures? i know i saw them!!! how clever of them to turn the ship into something non threatening as a car.....It seemed....Then someone can just come and haul it away....Or drive it or something. i really was wondering why the military or police were not coming out there....I was not going to call..... i did not want to get marked....I also would have loved to document this with pictures etc. but as i said was scared to draw attention to myself with flash etc. because i have a five year old sleeping in the house. anyway i did take pics of the red car. i found out later that it was my neighbors car. when she went outside to leave for work her car was rolled over into the field or placed there somehow and she did not know how.  she thought she just forgot to put it in park and it rolled there!  i was watching all night and never saw it roll out there....It was morphed there or something....The creatures tried to fool me.  i know what i saw and it was very disturbing to me and i want to know why they were here and who they are.  i also did an experiment. red cars do not look white even in moonlight....The craft i saw was solid white. i have not told but two people. it was the single most bizarre, frightening and upsetting thing i have experienced. i want to take a lie detector test to prove to myself it really happened.
content.summary: Disk bottom curved edges smaller dome on top white or reflective in color, as it was lit by moonlite

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 12:30am when i left my friend's house in hawthorne.  as i was walking to my car a blue/green object in the sky caught my attention.  the sky was very cloudy and you couldn't see any other stars, planes, the moon.  at first i thought it was a star or maybe a planet like venus or mars but then i realized it was way too cloudy and also the object was giving off an aura.  it looked like it could of be a cylinder shape and when i looked closely with my eyes it also looked like it had a red light in the center of it and i could cover it with a penny at arm's length.  i quickly jumped into my car and sped off, the object at the time was on my right side.  as i was driving down wagaraw blvd at the gas station and stop light i noticed the object was on my left now and straight ahead in the distance i saw 3 amber lights dimming in and out in the outline of a triangle.  i started to panic and said to myself it's just street lights but then i realized it was way too high in the sky to be street lights and there's no mountains or hills in that direction.  i sped off into the prospect park area, when i turned down a street that i normally take to go home i saw in the distance in front that the blue/green object was next to the triangle object (this time the blue/green object was much smaller like how an airplane would look like up in the sky, like a good 300 feet away from it and the triangle's amber lights were dimming in and out like it was communicating to the blue/green object.  again i start panicking, as i was driving down haledon ave i can see the objects still but once i got into town, the trees, lights, and buildings blocked my view and that was the last i saw of the two them.

from the position and area they were, it looked like they could of been above the north haledon reservoir or wanaque (but my guess is wananque because of how smaller the blue/green object had gotten).

once i got outside of my house i ran out of the car into my house panicking, i couldn't sleep the rest of the night.

i had so many opportunities to snap photos and video with my phone but i was too terrified to too.
content.summary: Blue/green cylinder accompained by large triangle object

content.detailedDescription: On a thursday night out of bible class, we were on our way home in my mothers car, brother and sister and a friend of my mothers, and i always had a habit of looking out the back window of the car, an 1974 brown chrysler newport, we left out of the church and headed down collins to go to jackson st, and as i looked out the window, it was there, like it appered out of nowhere...Made no noise, no propeller, but was well lit up, with changing colors of its lights and it hung low in the clear night sky...Everyone figured it to be a blimp or some fancy projection, but i'm sure it was a ufo..I wasn't scared though, i was amazed at it, and i never told nobody this until now, for they would figure it to be a blimp or something, and i since never saw it again...And i wonder if it had affected me in some way, cause i now come up with so many ideas, including finding a flaw in the now 60-year old hypersonic engine program...I know nasa, darpa, and espically the air force was shocked at it, and the odd thing is i never saw this thing before in my life, but i knew it was designed wrong
content.summary: Changing lights, hovered over joliet for about 30 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of nov. 3, 2010 at around 11:40 i went outside to sit on my back porch and smoke a cigarette.  i was sitting and reclining on my bench looking up at the sky, which was entirely clear that night.  my backyard is obscured from surrounding streetlights by homes and garages and has great visibility at night, so i was looking up at the stars when a strange triangular formation of red lights entered my field of vision at about 90 degrees elevation.  for the first instant i believed it was a meteor, before i focused on the object(s) and realized that there were at least six lights travelling in a fixed formation.

the lights had no apparent disc, although they were fairly bright. they were around the same magnitude of brightness as an average star, but distinctly red in color.  the formation was an elongated triangle and travelled close to due east for about four seconds before fading out at around 45 degrees elevation, before reaching the lower limit of my field of vision (the top of my neighbor's garage).  the object(s) passed a few degrees to the north of the pleiades, which allowed me to judge its relative size to be about twice that of the constellation. it did not appear to me as if the space between the lights obscured any stars as it passed, so i believe the lights to have been discreet separate objects travelling in formation rather than lights attached to a single object. also, there was no sound at all from the objects.  i had the impression that they were flying at extraordinary altitude, probably beyond the atmoshpere.

i was startled and and somewhat spooked by the incident and remained outdoors for a few minutes after the sighting, waiting to see if the lights would return or anything else would appear.  when i returned indoors and looked at the time it was 11:50 pm.

i have no idea if this will stay formatted, but i'll attempt to "draw" the formation the way it appeared to me from the ground with an arrow indicating it's direction of motion.


 .
    .
 .      . 

    .

 .

||
||
\/
east
content.summary: About six red lights in triangular formation, twice the relative size of the pleiades, overflew me at a great altitude in an easterly direction.

content.detailedDescription: I'm up in the northwest valley of phoenix so i never actually saw the ufo that was reported. but about 10-15 minutes before the reported event i watched 3 fighters about 30 seconds apart in the sky over luke air force base. they were all headed south in the casa grande / tuscon direction. it didn't appear to be a drill, all 3 had their afterburners firing (you could distinctly hear all 3 as they took off) until i lost sight of them. so they appeared to be headed somewhere in a hurry. given the direction they were headed and the number of jets described in the report i'm almost positive these are the 3 fighter planes that were seen chasing down the object in san manuel.
content.summary: Confirmation of san manuel, az report

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a flash in the sky. looked up, and saw a solid bright object. i called for my friend and had him look at it.

the object was a solid bright object in the clear sky. i went to grab my camera, nikon d-90 w/ 18-200mm lens, iphone, ipad and my celestron nexstar 60 slt telescope. we looked at it through the camera, looks like a solid bright object.

i used my iphone 4 and ipad wifi and opened up starmappro and star walk. looked at the start map and location, there isn't suppose to be anything there. i can clearly see the moon to my right. it was not jupiter either.

my friend tried to take pictures with the iphone 4 and the d90, didn't come out that well. the object was very hard to see, i kept losing track of it.

i setup the telescope, with 35mm, 25mm, 9mm and 6mm lens. when i looked through the telescope and focused, i saw multiple orbs hovering and orbiting each other. i tried to count, lost count after 9. they kept moving around each other making it hard to keep counting.

i had my friend look through the telescope, total he had about 2-3 min looking through the telescope, i had over 5 min looking through the telescope. we both saw multiple orbs.

i tried to kept track of it switching out lens and making sure it wasn't just the lenses. the telescope got bumped when i had it on 6mm and we both lost track of it.

the objects was in the direction of east and heading below our horizon while the moon and jupiter was far right of the objects and rising.

the orbs were solid glowing uniformly, didn't see any shadows, orbiting each other like you would see an animated atom with electrons moving around the a nucleus.
content.summary: Bright object in the sky looked through a telescope, saw multiple orbs

content.detailedDescription: I am reporting this incident for the witness who wishes to remain anonymous at this time. i received several photos taken in rural carmarthenshire, wales, uk near carmarthen on november 5, 2010 around 7 pm local time. the witness noticed the object rise from behind a hill at a distance of approx. 1/2 mile. the ufo hovered for about a minute then continued to rise until it was out of sight. it was described as disc shaped with red lights. the photo was taken with a cell phone. after talking to the witness, i estimate this object was at least 150 ft. across...Possibly up to 200 ft. as you can see in the photo, the object seems to have structures on it. there have been a few unusual sightings in this specific area recently. the witness has asked me not to disclose further location information. i realize the this was guy fawkes night in the united kingdom and that there are traditionally fireworks and bonfires...But the witness is very reliable. at this time, the images will be posted at *(link moved to additional evidence sectio--cms/sg). under copyright
content.summary: Large disc shaped object with red and white lights and structure

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i went outside to look at the stars after our event last nite to see if we saw anything odd. we went out onto the porch and turned off the porch light and being out in the country it was pitch black and you could see all the stars in the sky beautifully....Out of the corner of my eye i saw a flash which my husband was apparently looking directly at and describes as simialar to a shooting star but tearing across the sky in a split second and much brighter....A few seconds later i saw one on the opposite side of the porch and it looked like someone cut a slit in the sky it was so bright....Gone in a second....Then another about a minute or so later as i was looking behind the house.....So we saw 3 in all....Incredible and strange....Dont know what this was but never seen it before.....Will keep paying attention to the sky! we had to come in because it is way too cold out....But something def odd....Would have taken pics but my camera cant pick up the stars as it is not the greatest camera unfourtunatly
content.summary: 3 flashes in sky
